pages.title: Binding Card
pages.text: A Binding Card links a player with a $(l:item_charging/player_transmitter)Player Transmitter$(/l) to provide cable-less charging in the same dimension. A Binding Card must be linked to a player before it is added to the Player Transmitter. Hold a Binding Card and right-click to bind it to you.
A Blank Card is required to craft a Binding Card. The next page has the recipe.
